subLevels.question_text: App mai likhi commands ko kya kahte hai?
Code likhne wale logo ko kya kahte hai ?
Smartphone mai apps kyu hoti hai ?

options.value: Smartphone ko hero bnane ke liye
Smartphone ko charge krne ke liye
Smartphone ko command dene ke liye
Smartphone ko Kahani sunane ke liye

subLevels.question_text: Coding kise kahte hai ?
Mobile app ya website bnane ke liye kya krna padta hai ?
Coding krke app bnane ko kya kahte hai ?
Web development kise kahte hai ?
Website bnane wale coder ko ham kya kahte hai ?
Code ko samaj kar, user ko screen par website kon dikhata hai ?
Kisi bhi website ko apne browser mai open krne ke liye kya chahiye ?
Browsers in sab mai se konsi langauge samajte hai ?
Ham HTML language kyu sikh rahe hai ?
HTML language mai kya sikhna zruri hai ?
Paragraph dikhane ke liye HTML mai konsa tag use hota hai ?
HTML mai h5 tag ki madat se ham kya dikhate hai ?
HTML mai h2 se badi heading konsi hai ?
Closing tag ke pas esa kya hai, jo opening tag ke pas nahi hai ?

subLevels.problem_statement:
Aapko coding karke is image ki terah dikhne wali ek website bnani hai.
![image](https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/1000444317862744234/1089867663712456844/Exercise_1_VIDEO_4.jpg)

subLevels.question_text: Coding mai clean code ka kya matlab hai ?

options.value: Jis code ko hath saaf karke likha gya ho
Clean shave krke likha hua code
Jis code ko padhna aur smajna aasaan ho
Esa code jo computer ko saaf krke likha gya ho

subLevels.question_text: HTML language ki help se ham browser ko website ke bare mai kya btate hai ?
Ham website ke content ka color, position aur size browser ko konsi language ki help se btate hai ?
Website mai link dikhane ke liye konsa html tag use hota hai ?
‘a’ tag mai link add karne ke liye konsa attribute use hota hai ?
Kisi bhi HTML tag mai, html attribute kaha likhe jate hai ?

options.value: Opening aur closing tag ke beech mai

subLevels.question_text: Konsa html attribute link ko hamesha ek new tab mai open karta hai ?
Ek html tag mai jayda se jayda kitne html attribute lga sakte hai ?

subLevels.problem_statement:
Aapko apni website mai 'click here' naam ka link dikhana hai, jisko click karne par new tab mai codeyogi ka youtube channel open ho jae.
CodeYogi ke youtube channel ka link - https://youtube.com/@CodeYogi

subLevels.question_text: Website pe image dikhane ke liye konsa html tag use hota hai ?
img tag mai ‘src’ attribute kyu use hota hai ?

options.value: Website ka link dene ke liye
Image ka link dene ke liye
Image ko sundar bnane ke liye

subLevels.question_text: ‘alt’ attribute mai likha text website par kab dikhta hai ?

options.value: Image ke achhe se dikhne par
Image ke achhe se load na hone par

subLevels.question_text: Bina closing tag ke close hone wale html tag ko kya kahte hai ?
Inn sab mai se void element konsa hai ?

subLevels.problem_statement: Aapko ek website bnani hai, jisme ek waterfall ki image dikhe aur agar kisi wagah se image load na ho pae to uski jagah "waterfall" text likha hua aa jae. Aap internet se koi bhi waterfall ki image use kar sakte hai.

subLevels.question_text: HTML mai style tag kyu use hota hai ?
Css ruleset mai likha selector, browser ko kya btata hai ?

options.value: Ruleset mai likhi properties kispar apply hongi
Hera pheri 3 mai hero koin hoga
Is ruleset mai kitni properties likhi hai
Css code mai kitni lines hai

subLevels.question_text:
Is code ke hisab se heading aur paragraph konse color ke dikhenge ?
![image](https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/1128549911424671877/1133021969168732230/exercise.png)
Css ruleset mai curly braces { } ke andar kya likha jata hai ?
Text ka size bdane ke liye konsi css property use hoti hai ?
Pixels ko code mai kis short form ke sath likha jata hai ?

subLevels.problem_statement:
Aapko same is image ki terah dikhne wali ek website bnani hai.
![image](https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/1128549911424671877/1134688967699222618/Website.png)
Hint: Heading size is 40 pixels.

subLevels.question_text: Sab logo ko dhayan mai rakh kar, website bnane ko kya kahte hai ?
Jo log dheak nahi paate, vo website kese use karte hai ?
Apni website ko search engine ke results mai top par laane ki kosis ko kya kahte hai ?
Jis code mai sahi jagah par sahi html tag use kiya ho, uss code ko kya kahte hai ?

title: Inline vs Block elements and Nested tags

subLevels.question_text: Konse elements zrurat ke hisab se jagah lete hain ?
Konse elements thoda sa content hone par bhi puri line gher lete hai ?
Tag ke andar tag ko kya bola jata hai ?
In sab mai se ek inline element konsa hai ?
Ek code mai kitne nested tags ho sakte hai ?

Is code mai esa konsa tag hai jo div tag ka children hai aur a tag ka parent ?
![image](https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/1128549911424671877/1133969268715831356/exercise10.png)
Ek tag ke content ko alag alag hisso mai todne ka kaam konsa tag karta hai ?

subLevels.problem_statement:
Aapko coding karke is image ki terah dikhne wali ek website bnani hai.
![image](https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/1128549911424671877/1135106855748784209/website_10.png)
Kuch important links jinki zrurat aapko website bnane mai padegi:-

- CodeYogi website - https://codeyogi.io
- CodeYogi youtube  - https://youtube.com/@CodeYogi
- CodeYogi twitter - https://twitter.com/TheCodeYogi_
- CodeYogi linkedIn - https://www.linkedin.com/company/thecodeyogi/
- CodeYogi instagram - https://www.instagram.com/TheCodeYogi

title: CSS Box Model and common CSS Properties

subLevels.question_text: In sab mai se, border width, border color aur border style property ko ek line mai likhne ka sahi tarika konsa hai ?
Border ke corners ( कोनो ) ko gol karne ke liye, ham konsi css property ka use karte hai ?
In sab mai se konsi property inline elements par kaam nahi karti ?
Kisi bhi element mai border aur content area ke beech ke space ko kya bolte hai ?

![image](https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/1128549911424671877/1134022544991731762/exercise11.2.png)
In sabhi mai se is button par konsi padding property lag rahi hai ?
Inline element ko block element mai badalne ke liye, konsi css property use hoti hai ?
Kisi element ko padding right dene ke liye inme se konsi css property ka use hota hai ?
Kisi element par margin add karne ke liye inn mai se konsi css property use hoti hai ?

![image](https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/1128549911424671877/1134026578683248750/exercise_11.3.png) 
Is code mai likhi hui margins ko ek line mai likhne ka konsa tarika sahi hai ?
Kisi css ruleset ko, jab code mai likhe sare tags par lgana ho, to uss ruleset ka selector kya hoga ?

![image](https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/1128549911424671877/1134179868070912171/exercise_14.png)
Is website mai heading aur paragraph ke beech kitne pixels ka space aaega ?
Vo konse elements hai, jo content ke hisab se width lete hai aur unpar top bottom margin bhi kaam karti hai ?

subLevels.problem_statement:
Aapko iss image ki terah dikhne wali ek website bnani hai. Jisme click here naam ke link pe click karne par, codeyogi ki website open ho jae.
![image](https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/1128549911424671877/1136369366741565530/exercise_11.png)
Some hints for this assignment:
1. Heading text size - 40px
2. Link text size - 20px
3. CodeYogi website link - https://codeyogi.io/
